snippet: During tests, an open valve on the aircraft caused fuel to leak from a nozzle on the left wing used to remove fuel, Japan Airlines said.
abstract: Japan Airlines reports a Boeing 787 Dreamliner jet undergoing checks in Tokyo after a fuel leak a week earlier again leaked fuel during testing; causes of both incidents remain unknown.
lead_paragraph: During tests, an open valve on the aircraft caused fuel to leak from a nozzle on the left wing used to remove fuel, Japan Airlines said.

headline.seo: Japan Airlines Says 787 Jet Leaked Fuel During Safety Test
headline.main: 787 Jet Leaks Fuel During Safety Test
headline.print_headline: 787 Jet Leaks Fuel During Safety Test
